00019 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H
00020 #define _RTAI_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H
00021 
00022 #include <linux/bitops.h>
00023 
00024 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00025 
00026 #include <asm/atomic.h>
00027 #include <asm/system.h>
00028 
00029 #define atomic_xchg(ptr,v)      xchg(ptr,v)
00030 #define atomic_cmpxchg(ptr,o,n) cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)
00031 
00032 #else /* !__KERNEL__ */
00033 
00034 #ifndef likely
00035 #if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 96
00036 #define __builtin_expect(x, expected_value) (x)
00037 #endif
00038 #define likely(x)       __builtin_expect(!!(x), 1)
00039 #define unlikely(x)     __builtin_expect(!!(x), 0)
00040 #endif /* !likely */
00041 
00042 struct __rtai_xchg_dummy { unsigned long a[100]; };
00043 #define __rtai_xg(x) ((struct __rtai_xchg_dummy *)(x))
00044 
00045 #include <asm/atomic.h>
00046 
00047 static inline unsigned long atomic_xchg (volatile void *ptr,
00048                                          unsigned long x)
00049 {
00050     __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK_PREFIX "xchgl %0,%1"
00051                          :"=r" (x)
00052                          :"m" (*__rtai_xg(ptr)), "0" (x)
00053                          :"memory");
00054     return x;
00055 }
00056 
00057 static inline unsigned long atomic_cmpxchg (volatile void *ptr,
00058                                             unsigned long o,
00059                                             unsigned long n)
00060 {
00061     unsigned long prev;
00062 
00063     __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK_PREFIX "cmpxchgl %1,%2"
00064                          : "=a"(prev)
00065                          : "q"(n), "m" (*__rtai_xg(ptr)), "0" (o)
00066                          : "memory");
00067 
00068     return prev;
00069 }
00070 
00071 /* Depollute the namespace a bit. */
00072 #undef ADDR
00073 
00074 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00075 
00076 #endif /* !_RTAI_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H */
